jobDescription: Contracted to work on various greenfield projects that included modern technologies such as Remix, React, Tailwind, Shadcn/UI, and Typescript.

Worked on a tracking system for custom-made devices and implemented Agile practices for a software development lifecycle. I was also engaged with design work such as redesigning the business website, editing proposals, and UI/UX for the software product.

role: Scrum Master, Software Developer, Tester, and Trainer
jobDescription: Hired as a software developer for cutting-edge communication systems, I also contributed as a software tester. I served as a Scrum Master for an eight-person team, onboarding new employees and creating training materials to meet contractual requirements. Additionally, I volunteered with We3, organizing workshops and events to promote workplace equality, initially focused on women in engineering before expanding to inclusivity for all.

Responsible for building & maintaining the front-end for a customer-facing HR & advertising platform, including porting the project to the Vue JS framework, and actively collaborating with the in-house UI/UX team for feature development.

role: Project Manager, Graphic and UI/UX Designer, Customer Relations, and Software Testing
jobDescription: Started in project management and customer relations, later expanding into design and feature testing to support a growing client base. My curiosity led me to building and testing features myself, eventually maintaining WordPress sites and developing my own projects.

role: Art, English, Dance, Drama, Technology, Maths, Science, History, and various one-off subjects
jobDescription: Formally trained in English and Drama, I have taught various subjects in a variety of schools in both Australia and the United Kingdom. Alongside regular classroom duties, a typical workload included designing lesson plans, assignments, units of work, managing students with special needs, school excursions, fundraising, musical productions, staff training and evaluations, assisting with extra-curricular activities, and playground supervision.
Booking motorcycle hires, organising private lessons, data entry, stock management, invoicing, and customer support.
